author: Gian
text:
I am one of many students, who, for the nth time the past few weeks, cannot focus on their academic responsibilities because of the upcoming elections.

And that's okay. Buhay, karapatan, hanap-buhay, kalusugan at marami pang iba ang nakataya sa darating na May 9, 2022 elections.

author: Gian
text:
It's really crazy how lawyers and law students are calling for a "non-political" environment, when the legal profession is molded by politics. Heck, even one of the major Bar subjects is Political Law.

Clearly, you cannot separate politics from the legal profession. https://t.co/hBRusMW5gP

author: Gian
text: Respect to all members of that certain religion. I know a lot of members are still critical and able to discern. But no respect will be afforded to religious group leaders who enforce block voting involving murderers and plunderers. You are holding your members hostage.

author: Gian
text: Fresh batch of Thomasian lawyers will be heading to Balesin courtesy of the ever-generous Dean Divina! Congrats again, mga bagong Tomasinong abogado! 💛

author: Gian
text:
"Marcos Jr. received INC’s bloc vote as VP in 2016 but lost to Leni Robredo" The headline we needed!

In 2016, Leni fought hard without assurance. In 2022, we have hundreds of thousands of volunteers going out and standing up for her. Kung nagawa nung 2016, kaya rin ngayong 2022. https://t.co/mchjuVY1iS

author: Gian
text:
Someone's excited and ready for the May 7 Miting De Avance of Leni & Kiko! Pero release niyo na muna final venue, please? See you there, friends! Ipanalo na natin 'to! 🌷🌸💖

#AngatBuhayLahat
#IpanaloNa10ToParaSaLahat
#LeniKiko2022 https://t.co/lsqy79bvoD

author: Gian
text: You are here. This is my favorite place.

author: Gian
text:
Been a while since I last listened to the music of Cynthia Alexander. Found myself playing her songs since the wee hours of the morning. What a local treasure.

If you don't know her, I suggest you dive into her music. The artistry is on another level.
https://t.co/TJ6Bny6hXy

author: Gian
text: My last two brain cells talking to each other: https://t.co/xXkJZ25R6N https://t.co/8xquC93ana

author: Gian
text:
Leni will win. LENI WILL WIN. #TanglawLagunaRally
#IpanaloNa10ParaSaLahat
#LeniKiko2022
🌷🌸💖

author: Gian
text: What if I never get to find one? What if I don't deserve that kind of love? What if I don't deserve someone who's kind? Someone gentle. Someone patient. Someone who genuinely understands my soul. Or if I get to find one, what if time and circumstances won't be my friend again?

author: Gian
text: In hopes of finding my own golden retriever. https://t.co/JWwRWds6WT

author: Gian
text: It doesn't really take much to be kinder with our choice of words and how we talk to people.

author: Gian
text: Anger management sessions (among others) should be accessible for everyone because a lot of you don't know how it feels to be traumatized and to be at the receiving end of your anger. No one deserves to be lashed out on for relatively small things.

author: Gian
text: Volunteered for the house-to-house campaign for Leni after my midterms and will be attending the Laguna rally. All out for Leni matapos lang ang exams. Let's go!

author: Gian
text: I grew up surrounded by people with anger management issues. It triggers me whenever someone raises their voice at me or answers in a way that's not kind and very passive aggressive. It brings out a bad side of me. I tend to answer back. So I just choose not to engage anymore.

author: Gian
text: If they want to talk it out with me, then I'll be there. But I won't be the punching bag of their emotional frustrations. Because I did nothing against them and I deserve none of their anger. We understand. We let them be. We allow them to process their emotions if they need to.
